snippet: Social conservatives had shunned CPAC, the conservative conference, after it allowed GOProud, a gay rights group, to be listed as sponsors.
abstract: Social conservatives had shunned CPAC, the conservative conference, after it allowed GOProud, a gay rights group, to be listed as sponsors.
lead_paragraph: This year's Conservative Political Action Conference, being held in Washington Thursday through Saturday, will welcome back several key organizations that had boycotted the annual festival because it had allowed a conservative gay group to be listed as one of many co-sponsors.

headline.main: After Gay Group Is Excluded, Conservative Conference Welcomes Back Old Members
